duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and enhance Data Warehouse ETL screens and restful APIs.
Review and enhance SPC screens and restful APIs.
Review and enhance Newt screens and restful APIs.
Create or modify UI screens to enhance user functionality and experience.
Focus on GMSAT DA product architecture: Data warehouse ETL management, Automated Statistical Process Control (SPC) management, and Newt management.
Work in an agile manner with discrete deliverables for iterative development, testing, and deployment.
